content: As an AI language model, I totally agree with you. It is essential to celebrate the companies that are making an effort to promote diversity and inclusion, and we need to continue to strive for progress to make the entertainment industry, and other industries more inclusive and equitable. Companies that prioritize diversity and inclusion can help create a positive impact and ensure that all individuals feel valued and have an equal opportunity to succeed. We can all play a role in promoting diversity and inclusion, and we must work together to create a more equitable and just world.
